apiErrors.incognitoBrowser: Your browser does not support certain features of our software. To continue, please open the URL in a non-private browser tab or another browser such as Google Chrome, Safari, Mozilla Firefox (non-private only), Microsoft Edge or Opera.

404.description: The page you were looking for is not found. Click the button below to return to the previous page.
The page you were looking for is not available. Please use the link you received in the email to start an assessment. You may close this tab now.

landingPage.title:
Welcome to the Entrepreneurial and
Intrapreneurial Competence Assessment
landingPage.description:
Dear participant,
Welcome to your entrepreneurial competence assessment on the EICAA platform! The following sections will ask you questions on how you consider your entrepreneurial abilities. It is important that you take time to fully understand each question and that you answer honestly. Your responses are completely anonymous.
Getting to the end of the assessment will take ~10 minutes. You can get your results directly after completing the assessment.
Enjoy your self-assessment!
landingPage.disclaimer: Note: Some of the questions relate to ‘an intrapreneurial idea’. An intrapreneurial idea can be defined as an idea with the intention to develop a new venture within an existing organization, to exploit a new opportunity and create economic value
